title: 105_hr688
content: The Act titled "Leaking Underground Storage Tank Trust Fund Amendments Act of 1997" addresses distributions from the Leaking Underground Storage Tank Trust Fund, specifically focusing on leaking underground storage tanks. The Leaking Underground Storage Tank Trust Fund Amendments Act of 1997 mandates the distribution of at least 85 percent of funds to states each fiscal year for specific purposes related to corrective actions, compensation programs, and enforcement. The Leaking Underground Storage Tank Trust Fund Amendments Act of 1997 requires states to enforce approved programs, corrective actions, and compensation programs for underground storage tank releases when owner resources are insufficient. The Leaking Underground Storage Tank Trust Fund Amendments Act of 1997 requires states to enforce approved programs, corrective actions, and compensation programs for underground storage tank releases. Funds provided by the Administrator may not be used for financial assistance to meet tank requirements. The Administrator distributes funds to states with cooperative agreements. The Administrator distributes funds from the Trust Fund to states using an allocation process developed for cooperative agreements. The process can be revised after consulting with state agencies and considering factors like total revenue received and confirmed releases from leaking underground storage tanks. The Trust Fund distributes funds to states for cooperative agreements, with direct payments to state agencies. Cost recovery for releases from underground storage tanks is prohibited. Technical amendments are made to the Solid Waste Disposal Act. The Solid Waste Disposal Act (42 U.S.C. 6991 et seq.) is amended to correct typographical errors and improve clarity in various sections. The Solid Waste Disposal Act is amended to correct typographical errors and improve clarity in various sections by changing "relevent" to "relevant" and "Evironmental" to "Environmental" in subsection (b)(4). SEC. 201. Extension of Trust Fund Purposes to carry out section 9003(h) and section 9004(f) of the Solid Waste Disposal Act. Attest: ROBIN H. CARLE, Clerk.
